title: Discussion of the paper �Language after Liftoff: Fed Communication Away from the Zero Lower Bound�
content: Flow-Based Asset Purchase Program (QE3)  • Sept. 13, 2012:  Purchase agency MBS at pace of $40 billion per  month (continue MEP)  • Dec. 12, 2012:  Purchase longer-term Treasuries at pace of $45 billion  per month after MEP ends; continue agency MBS purchases  • Economic conditionality  • Continue purchases until substantial improvement in outlook for labor market  in context of price stability  • Take appropriate account of efficacy and costs of purchases  5
